-- | Basic arithmatic in haskell
--   
--   Basic arithmatic in haskell
@package arithmatic
@version 0.1.0.1

module Math.Arithmatic
inc :: Integer -> Integer
dec :: Integer -> Integer
add :: Integer -> Integer -> Integer
multiply :: Integer -> Integer -> Integer
division :: (Num a1, Num a, Ord a1) => a1 -> a1 -> a
power :: Integer -> Integer -> Integer
logarithm :: (Num a1, Num a, Ord a1) => a1 -> a1 -> a
